lingpy.basic.wordlist.WordList.addEntries¶

WordList.addEntries(entry, source, function, **args)¶

Add new entry-types to the word list by modifying given ones.

Parameters :

entry : string

A string specifying the name of the new entry-type to be added to the word list.

source : string

A string specifying the basic entry-type that shall be modified.

function : function

A function which is used to convert the source into the target value.

keywords : {dict list}

A dictionary of keywords that are passed as parameters to the function.

Notes

This method can be used to add new entry-types to the data by converting given ones.
